title: ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Alphabetize somebody at night, adding each letter in their role name that you do not currently have to your letter list.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a letter list that fills up whenever you alphabetize a player.
- You may alphabetize dead people.
- If there is no role containing a certain letter of the alphabet, you start the game with that letter.
- The first time you would die, you do not. If you are not part of the Daily Streak Faction, gain an extra use of this attribute for each 5 letters you collect.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the Daily Streak Faction, once you complete your list, you may deal a powerful attack each night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Collect all letters of the alphabet.

desc:
Post 4776
*"Please, I just want to pass my spelling test."*
